thread.section_title: Fancy Dress Ball Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fancy Dress Ball | www.fancydressball.co.uk | 4 of 605
thread.title: Showtechs
thread.title_full: Fancy Dress Ball reviewed by Showtechs

author: Showtechs
title: Showtechs
text:
They have a wide range of outfits. The delivery was prompt and in time. The bandana was a little small for an adult head and really should have had a couple of extra inches of material.
Hopefully there will be more occasions in the future to order from them.
Overall a good experience.
